attributes.additional_details:
Richard Parks should be recognised for his acievement in completeing his "737 Challenge", the first person to ever complete such a challenge & gaining the respect of many people, including the explorer Sir Rannolph Finnes.

This challenge was even more remarkable as it was the first such venture that Parks had ever attempted, beating his own 7 month deadline with a time of 06 Months, 11 Days, 07 Hours and 53 Minutes.

Richard is an inspiration to many & given the outstanding achievement & significant amount of sponsorship on behalf of the Marie Curie Cancer Care charity should be recognised accordingly.
